profile.name: Rami Daood
profile.title: Full Stack Engineer
profile.tagline: Versatile and ambitious Full Stack Engineer with strong foundations in software engineering, artificial intelligence, and mobile/web development. Experienced in building scalable applications using Next.js, NestJS, and Flutter. Adept at solving complex problems, building real-time systems, and delivering impactful projects for accessibility and business automation.

about.summary: Versatile and ambitious Full Stack Engineer with strong foundations in software engineering, artificial intelligence, and mobile/web development. Currently working with Next.js, NestJS, and Flutter to build scalable, high-performance applications across web and mobile platforms. I'm passionate about creating innovative solutions that make a real impact, whether it's helping visually impaired individuals navigate their surroundings or streamlining business operations through automation.

highlights.title: Full Stack Development
highlights.description: Expert in building scalable web and mobile applications using modern technologies like Next.js, NestJS, and Flutter

highlights.title: Problem Solving
highlights.description: Adept at solving complex problems and building real-time systems

highlights.title: Project Delivery
highlights.description: Proven track record of delivering impactful projects for accessibility and business automation

education.description: Comprehensive training covering Linux shell scripting, command-line tools, Git workflows, and system administration fundamentals.

workExperience.title: Full Stack Engineer
responsibilities: Working across Frontend, Backend, and Mobile platforms to build scalable, high-performance applications using Next.js, NestJS, and Flutter (Dart)
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design seamless user experiences
Maintaining a unified backend architecture and delivering reliable, production-grade solutions across web and mobile environments

workExperience.title: Tier 3 AI Training Engineer
responsibilities: Leading fine-tuning and optimization of machine learning models
Investigating performance issues across AI systems

workExperience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Developed a video training application for elderly users using Java and Spring Boot
Implemented a modular system for managing exercise videos
Built an adaptive difficulty algorithm based on user engagement
Collaborated with clients using Jira and agile practices

projects.title: Dellio
projects.subtitle: Intelligent Data Workbench for Database Design, Validation & Learning
projects.description: AI-assisted data workbench that combines schema design, runnable SQL, diagrams, validation, and guided learning into a single interactive environment. Developed as part of Dell Technologies × Tsofen-Tashbik Full-Stack AI Bootcamp. Features include schema builder & ERD generation, interactive SQL lab, database validation engine, migration preview, image-to-database parsing, speech-to-text SQL input, and auto-graded SQL training exercises.
highlights: Designed pluggable SQL adapter architecture supporting multiple database engines
Implemented sandboxed SQL execution with previews and dry-runs
Built validation engine to detect schema anti-patterns and data issues
Integrated AI in controlled, opt-in manner for hints and explanations
Safety-first UX for destructive database actions
projects.projectType: Product-oriented system · AI-assisted developer tooling · Educational platform

projects.title: Shepsi – לחלום זקנה
projects.description: Interactive Hebrew-first quiz application built to help students prepare for Hebrew theory-based exams. Features dynamic question flow, persistent progress tracking, and dedicated practice for incorrect answers with full RTL and Hebrew language support. Adopted by ~600 students as a community learning resource.

projects.title: AI Smart Glasses for the Visually Impaired
projects.description: Designed and integrated AI technologies into smart glasses to help visually impaired individuals navigate their surroundings. Implemented real-time object detection and depth estimation using YOLOv5 and MiDaS models.

projects.title: درسني – Darsni
projects.subtitle: Gamified Educational Platform for Bagrut Exam Preparation
projects.description: Interactive educational platform that gamifies Bagrut exam preparation through a game-like learning journey. Students progress through courses while earning XP, maintaining streaks, and unlocking achievements. Features video lessons, quizzes, practice materials, student dashboard with progress tracking, and admin panel for content management. Designed with Arabic-first UX and RTL awareness.
highlights: Gamified learning system with XP, levels, streaks, and achievements
Interactive courses with video lessons, quizzes, and practice materials
Student dashboard with clear progress tracking and performance insights
Admin panel for managing courses, content, and users
Arabic-first UX with RTL awareness and responsive design
projects.projectType: Concept-driven product · Gamified UX · Educational platform

projects.title: Appointment App for Businesses
projects.description: Created a web application for managing appointments and meetings. Integrated with various calendar services and implemented automated reminders.

projects.title: Machine Learning Project: Laptop Condition & Price Prediction
projects.description: Implemented custom machine learning models to predict laptop conditions and prices based on various features. Achieved high accuracy in predictions.

projects.title: Broadcast Viewership Tracker
projects.description: Developed a system to track TV viewership and analyze viewing patterns. Implemented data collection and visualization features.

projects.title: Hotel Management System
projects.description: Designed and implemented a comprehensive hotel management system with features for reservations, room management, and billing.
